channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- Xcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- Xcode

item.title: CVE-2022-32920|2024-09-30T14:57:40.468Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in Xcode 14.0. Parsing a file may lead to disclosure of user information.

item.title: CVE-2024-44162|2024-09-17T14:23:10.070Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: This issue was addressed by enabling hardened runtime. This issue is fixed in Xcode 16. A malicious application may gain access to a user's Keychain items.

item.title: CVE-2024-40862|2024-09-17T14:17:02.422Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: A privacy issue was addressed by removing sensitive data. This issue is fixed in Xcode 16. An attacker may be able to determine the Apple ID of the owner of the computer.

item.title: CVE-2024-44191|2024-09-17T19:19:49.259Z -- apple -- xcode
item.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management. This issue is fixed in iOS 17.7 and iPadOS 17.7, Xcode 16, visionOS 2, watchOS 11, macOS Sequoia 15, iOS 18 and iPadOS 18, tvOS 18. An app may gain unauthorized access to Bluetooth.
